summary: Completed testing of TON City Builder iteration 5 - Tutorial modal, Online users counter, and Treasury health features. Backend APIs 86% passing (12/14 tests). Frontend tutorial modal and income table working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 520 error for test wallet addresses (likely Cloudflare rate limiting)

issues: Console warnings about missing DialogTitle for accessibility - minor accessibility issue

passed_tests: Backend: /api/health returns healthy status ✅
Backend: /api/stats returns game statistics (3 players, 10000 total plots) ✅
Backend: /api/stats/online returns online count (1 user online) ✅
Backend: /api/stats/heartbeat requires authentication ✅
Backend: /api/admin/treasury-health requires admin authentication ✅
Backend: /api/stats/income-table returns income data for 22 business types ✅
Backend: Income table Russian translation working (Ферма) ✅
Backend: /api/businesses/types returns 22+ business types ✅
Backend: /api/plots returns plots list ✅
Backend: /api/plots/coords/50/50 returns center plot (100 TON, center zone) ✅
Backend: /api/plots/coords/0/0 returns edge plot (10 TON, outskirts zone) ✅
Backend: /api/leaderboard returns leaderboard data ✅
Frontend: Landing page loads correctly ✅
Frontend: Tutorial button (Take Tutorial) visible on landing page ✅
Frontend: Tutorial modal opens with 7 interactive steps ✅
Frontend: Tutorial modal has Next/Back navigation buttons ✅
Frontend: Tutorial modal shows step indicator (Step X/7) ✅
Frontend: Tutorial modal closes with 'Start Playing!' button ✅
Frontend: Income Calculator page loads at /income-table ✅
Frontend: Income Table page has 'Want to learn more?' section ✅
Frontend: Income Table page has Tutorial button at bottom ✅
Frontend: Tutorial modal opens from Income Table page ✅
Frontend: Income Calculator button visible on landing page ✅
critical_code_review_comments: TutorialModal.jsx: Missing DialogTitle accessibility attribute - add aria-label or DialogTitle component for screen readers

success_rate.backend: 86% (12/14 tests passed - 2 auth tests failed due to Cloudflare 520 error)
success_rate.frontend: 100% (all tutorial and income table features working)

seed_data_creation: Test users created with TEST_ prefix for wallet verification tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features tested: 1) TutorialModal with 7 interactive steps (Welcome, City Zones, Production Chain, Business Connections, Business Levels, Taxes & Fees, Winning Strategy). 2) Online users counter API at /api/stats/online working. 3) Treasury health API at /api/admin/treasury-health requires admin auth. 4) Tutorial buttons on landing page and income table page working. Game page requires wallet connection to test online counter display. Auth tests fail with 520 error - likely Cloudflare rate limiting on test addresses.
